item.title: Conventional Branch Specification One-Year Anniversary — From Zero to Global Developer Adoption
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: 12K+ visits, multilingual translations, and global developer adoption—the journey of the Conventional Branch specification’s first year

item.title: Conventional Branch Specification Released!
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the Conventional Branch specification, which provides a structured naming convention for Git branches to enhance readability and collaboration.
